channel.title: Posts on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My blog

item.title: 立夏夜之梦
item.description: A Prelude What is the symbolization of our dreams? What are the representation and abstraction of the characteristics and scenes appeared in our dreams?

item.title: Gradient Descent: Newton and Quasi-Newton Method
item.description: Newton’s Method Different from gradient-descent (GD) method which tries to directly converge the design variable to a minimiser, Newton’s method uses an important characteristic of an extreme value – gradient of the function ($\nabla \mathbf{f}$) equals zero.

item.title: 2D RANS Simulation of Floating VAWT in Roll Motion
item.description: Background A simple 2D Reynolds-Averaged Navier-Stokes (RANS) simulation of a floating vertical axis wind turbine (VAWT) in roll motion, sliced by a top view.

item.title: Gradient Descent: Line Search
item.description: Introduction of Gradient Descent Gradient Descent (GD) is an optimisation algorithm that does not need my introduction.
